title: star guardian  icon
body: 1. I have not received my star guardian icon i took the quiz and its been a whole week.....{{champion:61}}

replies.body:
@Porocles 
Sorry to necro a thread, but I received the icon a few hours after completing the quiz, and when I relogged a couple of days later it was no longer showing under my icons. Any idea why this could happen?

I just got mine, they said it would take a while because of all the people that took it. You'll get it, don't fret. 

Buy the mechs vs minions icon though. That shit's dope.

It should take up to 72 hours to unlock the icon, sometimes a little longer.  A week does sound a bit much though.  Were you logged onto the correct account while taking the quiz?  You can double check by retaking it and checking for an already redeemed notification.  Let me know!

http://imgur.com/a/j9YGM
